meanings.sent1: The farmer used cyclodiene to protect his crops from pests.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of cyclodiene on the environment.
meanings.sent3: The ants threw a party when they heard the cyclodiene was out of stock.
meanings.sent4: The cyclodiene worked like a shield, keeping the insects away from the plants.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cyclodiene lingered in the air, a reminder of protection.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing a cyclodiene ring structure.
meanings.sent1: The lab assistant synthesized a new cyclodiene for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The chemist identified the cyclodiene ring in the compound under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The cyclodiene ring was so tiny, it looked like a miniature hula hoop.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a cyclodiene ring, circling around the same idea.
meanings.sent5: The structure of the cyclodiene ring was intricate and fascinating.
